Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

I'm unable to identify any diseases mentioned in the given paragraph as it is empty. Please provide a paragraph with relevant information about diseases for accurate identification.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

This is not an exhaustive list, and there are many other diseases that could be added depending on the context and specific information being discussed.
